channel.title: Malletts Creek Branch Library on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Malletts Creek Branch Library on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Library notes from Malletts Creek
item.description: Out for a bike ride to Malletts Creek Branch Library after a delicious lunch of BBQ at Ricewood. One of the challenges of low overhead custom postcard making is getting an image manipulation pipeline that kicks out photos that a appropriately cropped and sized. The latest challenge is identifying the single command line that will turn a photo from my phone’s camera into an appropriately sized image for the card with a minimum of cropping, distortion, and manual file transfers.

item.title: lunch with jonathan
item.description: Jonathan and I went to Paradise, a Vietnamese place in the Colonade that also serves Chinese food. He got Mongolian Beef, and I got pho deluxe. It was perfectly adequate if not spectacular. The topic of conversation was an elaborate storyline in a game that involved animatronics in a creepy Chuck E. Cheese type abandoned pizza parlor. We then went to the Malletts Creek library, until about 4:00 p.m. I worked on Hugo and constructed a theme from scratch.
